attributes.action: Make whole foods and healthy food more affordable than unhealthy food.
attributes.additional_details: Healthier people more productivity. Less strain on NHS
attributes.background: I believe the government should make healthy foods more affordable as this will help with less people needing the NHS and will make people more productive. I’ve been eating healthy for a few months now and it’s doubled my bill this is unacceptable.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition on removing taxes on certain types of food.
